There is considerable debate as to when HAART should be initiated, since the benefits of early treatment can be counteracted by antiviral drug toxicity 34. Here, we assume that at the end of the latent stage, an individual enters HAART with probability ρ, where ρ represents treatment coverage. HAART lengthens life, facilitates relative reduction in transmission, and improves the utility that an HIV− individual associates with unprotected sex, by an additive factor d (see Supplementary material). Since HAART availability improves the U
US , it affects whether individuals offer, or accept, unprotected sex, and hence it may influence the perceived risk parameter, b.
